body:
**Context** The Waybar needs refinement. We are missing the System Tray (for background apps like FDM/Discord), and there is visual clutter showing the CPU governor text ("schedutil") which is unnecessary.

Instructions for Copilot Please generate the code/scripts to perform the following:

1. Enable System Tray (config & dependencies)

Install: libappindicator-gtk3 (Required for Electron app icons).

Config (modules-right):

Add "tray" to the list (before the clock/power).

Configure it: {"icon-size": 18, "spacing": 10}.

Style (style.css):

Target #tray.

Give it the standard "Zero-Drag" pill look: background-color: #313244; (Surface0), border-radius: 15px;, padding: 0 10px;.

2. Clean Up Clutter

Remove "schedutil": Identify and remove the module printing the CPU governor (likely "power-profiles-daemon", "cpu", or "custom/governor").

Power Button Trigger: Ensure the existing "custom/power" module has "on-click": "wlogout".

Definition of Done:

Discord/FDM icons appear in the bar.

The word "schedutil" is gone.

Clicking the power icon attempts to launch wlogout.
title: Feature: Enable System Tray & Clean Up Waybar Modules
